Class ShipList

  • public class ShipList
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for storing the array list of both Player and Computer's Ships.

    • Method Detail

      • damagedSymbol

        public boolean damagedSymbol(int gridX,
                             int gridY)
        It is used to check if the ship has been damaged i.e hit atleast once.
        Parameters:
        gridX - the x coordinate of the ship
        gridY - the y coordinate of the ship return true if the ship has been hit atlest once

      • destroyedSymbol

        public boolean destroyedSymbol(int gridX,
                               int gridY)
        It is used to check if the ship has been destroyed i.e hit as many times as needed.
        Parameters:
        gridX - the x coordinate of the ship
        gridY - the y coordinate of the ship return true if the ship has been completely destroyed

      • gridSymbolMatch

        public boolean gridSymbolMatch(int gridX,
                               int gridY)
        It is used to match if the coordinates accepted as arguments matches any of the ships' coordinates
        Parameters:
        gridX - the x coordinate of the ship
        gridY - the y coordinate of the ship return true if the coordinate entered matches with a ship from the list

        It is used to check if all the ships in the limit is within their hull strength
